TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Shadow Bolt
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your Shadow Bolt spell by [@value]% and your Shadow Bolt has a [@value2]% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to spell damage, increasing spell critical strike chance against that target by 5%. Effect lasts 30 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Bane
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the casting time of your Shadow Bolt, Chaos Bolt and Immolate spells by [@value] sec and your Soul Fire spell by [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Aftermath
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the periodic damage done by your Immolate by [@value]% and your conflagrate has a [@value]% chance to daze the target for 5 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Molten Skin
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduce all damage taken by [@value]%

TalentsTiers.Name: Cataclysm
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the Mana cost of your Destruction spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Demonic Power
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Succubus' Lash of Pain spell by [@value] sec, and reduces the casting time of your Imp's Firebolt spell by [@value2] sec

TalentsTiers.Name: Shadowburn
TalentsTiers.Description:
105 mana
20 yd range

Instant Cast
15 sec cooldown

Reagents: Soul Shard
Instantly blasts the target for 91 to 104 Shadow damage. If the target dies within 5 secs of Shadowburn, and yields experience or honor, the caster gains a Soul Shard.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Ruin
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Destruction spells and your Imp's Firebolt spell by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Intensity
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting or channeling any Destruction spell by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Destructive Reach
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the range of your Destruction spells by [@value]% and reduces threat caused by Destruction spells by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Searing Pain
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Searing Pain spell by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Backlash
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your critical strike chance with spells by an additional [@value]% and gives you a [@value2]% chance when hit by a physical attack to reduce the cast time of your next Shadow Bolt or Incinerate spell by 100%. This effect lasts 8 sec and will not occur more than once every 8 seconds.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Immolate
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the initial damage of your Immolate spell by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Devastation
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Destruction spells by 5%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Nether Protection
TalentsTiers.Description: After being hit with a spell, you have a [@value]% chance to gain Nether Protection, reducing all damage by that spell school by 30% for 8 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Emberstorm
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by [@value]% and reduces the cast time of your Incinerate spell by [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Conflagrate
TalentsTiers.Description:
13% of base mana
30 yd range

Instant Cast
10 sec cooldown

Consumes an Immolate or Shadowflame effect on the target to instantyly deal damage equal to 60% of your Immolate or Shadowflame andcauses an additional 40% damage over 6 sec.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Soul Leech
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives your Shadow Bolt, Shadowburn, Chaos Bolt, Soul Fire, Incinerate, Searing Pain and Conflagrate spells a [@value]% chance to return health equal to 20% of the damage caused.

TalentsTiers.Name: Pyroclasm
TalentsTiers.Description: When you critically strike with searing Pain or Conflagrate, your Fire and Shadow spell damage is increased by [@value]% for 10 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shadow and Flame
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Shadow Bolt, Shadowburn, Chaos Bolt, Shadowfury and Incinerate spells gain an additional [@value]% of your bonus spell damage effects.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Soul Leech
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Soul Leech effect also restores mana to you and your summoned demon equal to [@value]% of maximum mana and has a [@value2]% chance to grant up to 10 party or raid members mana equal to 1% of maximum mana per 5 sec. Lasts 15 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Backdraft
TalentsTiers.Description: When you cast Conflagrate, the cast time of your next three Destruction spells is reduced by [@value]%. Lasts 15 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shadowfury
TalentsTiers.Description:
5% of base mana
30 yd range

Instant Cast
25 sec cooldown

Shadowfury is unleashed, causing 357 to 422 Shadow damage and stunning all enemies within 8 yds for 3 sec.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Empowered Imp
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your Imp by [@value]%, and all critical hits done by your Imp have a [@value2]% chance to increase your spell critical hit chance for your next Warlock spell by 100%. This effect lasts 8 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Fire and Brimstone
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your Incenerate and Chaos Bolt spells to targets affected by your Immolate by [@value]% and the critical strike chance of your Conflagrate spell is increased by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Chaos Bolt
TalentsTiers.Description:
6% of base mana
30 yd range

2.5 sec Cast
12 sec cooldown

Sends a bolt of chaotic fire at the enemy, dealing 685 to 861 Chaos damage. Chaos Bolt cannot be resisted, and pierces through all absorption effects.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks
